alert.note: Alert for Kossuth; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 15 at 9:18PM CDT until April 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Snow and Impactful Travel Expected Late Tonight and Sunday... .A strong spring storm will bring a combination of snow and wind to portions of northern Iowa late tonight and Sunday. The potential for snow and reduced visibility may cause impactful travel conditions at times overnight and Sunday. Persons planning on travel should check conditions prior to heading out and adjust travel plans as needed. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Northern Iowa. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility in snow may be reduced to one half mile or less at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.
